mapper.select: select id, username, password, admin_level, worker_id, begin_date, end_date, register_id, admin_state from admin_list where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into admin_list(username, password, admin_level, worker_id, begin_date, end_date, register_id, admin_state) values (#{username}, #{password}, #{adminLevel}, #{workerId}, #{beginDate}, #{endDate}, #{registerId}, #{adminState})

insert into admin_list(username, password, admin_level, worker_id, begin_date, end_date, register_id, admin_state) values
(#{entity.username}, #{entity.password}, #{entity.adminLevel}, #{entity.workerId}, #{entity.beginDate}, #{entity.endDate}, #{entity.registerId}, #{entity.adminState})

insert into admin_list(username, password, admin_level, worker_id, begin_date, end_date, register_id, admin_state) values
(#{entity.username}, #{entity.password}, #{entity.adminLevel}, #{entity.workerId}, #{entity.beginDate}, #{entity.endDate}, #{entity.registerId}, #{entity.adminState})
on duplicate key update username = values(username), password = values(password), admin_level = values(admin_level), worker_id = values(worker_id), begin_date = values(begin_date), end_date = values(end_date), register_id = values(register_id), admin_state = values(admin_state)
mapper.update:
update admin_list
username = #{username},
password = #{password},
admin_level = #{adminLevel},
worker_id = #{workerId},
begin_date = #{beginDate},
end_date = #{endDate},
register_id = #{registerId},
admin_state = #{adminState},
where id = #{id}
